entry.title: Crypto Lender Celsius Files for Bankruptcy Protection User withdrawals will remain halted.
entry.summary: Celsius, the crypto lender that last month halted withdrawals, has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection, the company said in a press release. User withdrawals will remain halted.

entry.title: StarkNet Testers Fume After Token Announcement
entry.summary: StarkWare plans to launch its native token in September.

entry.title: The Euro crashes as CPI data casts a shadow
entry.summary: The euro was last worth the same as the dollar in December 2002, shortly after the currency was established. 19 European countries use the Euro and that’s a lot of GDP to make a mess of. And of course we’re looking to the Fed’s interest rate hikes which have made the dollar dollar bill a … The Euro crashes as CPI data casts a shadow Read More »
